To everybody that's having trouble getting this installed, or having the computer crash when you try to install it:

Yes, you've got to have all that stuff done with Alcohol 120%, BUT for Windows 7 users, you've got to DISABLE User Account Controls! That's it. Disable UAC, restart your computer. Install the MD-11 just like the rest of it all said. Restart if necessary. Go back to UAC and put it on what it was on before the install, and restart your computer.

Worked for me after like 3 hours of trying. lol Don't know why I didn't think of it before hand :P

Enjoy, everybody!
Thanks alef1995! Works great!
